com.netflix.recipes.rss.manager
Class RSSManager

java.lang.Object
  com.netflix.recipes.rss.manager.RSSManager

public class RSSManager
extends java.lang.Object

RSS Manager that 1) Fetches content from RSS feeds using Ribbon 2) Parses RSS feeds 3) Persists feed urls into a) Cassandra using Astyanax (or) b) InMemoryStore
